Buffalo.Alling & Cory Buffalo Warehouse: Alling & Cory Buffalo Warehouse is a historic warehouse building located at Buffalo in Erie County, New York. It consists of a six-story, "L" shaped, 120,000-square-foot (11,000 m2) former paper warehouse building built in 1910-1911 for the Alling & Cory company of Rochester, with a one-story, brick loading dock addition built in 1926. It is built of reinforced concrete with classical detailing and considered to be of the "Daylight Factory" design.
